00010 // Check against redundant including
00011 #ifndef TT_LIMITER_H
00012 #define TT_LIMITER_H
00013 
00014 // Include appropriate headers
00015 #include "tt_audio_base.h"

00019 /********************************************************
00020         CLASS INTERFACE/IMPLEMENTATION
00021 
00022         The entire class is implemented inline for speed.
00023  ********************************************************/
00024 
00025 class tt_limiter:public tt_audio_base{
00026 
00027         private:
00028                 // Function pointer for the DSP Loop (use this instead of branching for speed)
00029                 typedef void (tt_limiter::*function_ptr_1in_1out)(tt_audio_signal *, tt_audio_signal *);
00030                 typedef void (tt_limiter::*function_ptr_2in_2out)(tt_audio_signal *, tt_audio_signal *, tt_audio_signal *, tt_audio_signal *);
00031                 function_ptr_1in_1out dsp_executor_mono;
00032                 function_ptr_2in_2out dsp_executor_stereo;
00033 
00034                 // Attributes Values & Variables 
00035                 tt_attribute_value_bool         defeat_dcblocker;
00036                 double                                          last_input1, last_input2;
00037                 double                                          last_output1, last_output2;
00038                 double                                          recover;
00039                 double                                          recip;
00040                 tt_sample_vector                        buf1, buf2, gain;
00041 //              tt_buffer                                       *buffer1, *buffer2, *buffer_gain;
00042                 long                                            bp, samps;
00043                 float                                           last;
00044 
00045                 tt_attribute_value                              threshold;                      
00046                 tt_attribute_value_discrete     mode;
00047                 tt_attribute_value                              release;
00048                 tt_attribute_value_discrete             lookahead;
00049                 tt_attribute_value                              preamp;                         
00050                 tt_attribute_value                              postamp;
00051                 
00052                 // set recover
00053                 void set_recover()
00054                 {
00055                         recover = 1000. / (release * sr);
00056                         if (recover == 0.) 
00057                                 recover = 1000. / (100000. * sr);
00058                                 
00059                         if (mode == k_mode_linear) 
00060                                 recover = recover * 0.5;
00061                         else 
00062                                 recover = recover * 0.707;
00063                 }
00064         
00065         
00066         public:
00067                 enum selectors{                                                                 // Attribute Selectors
00068                         k_defeat_dcblocker,
00069                         k_threshold,
00070                         k_release,
00071                         k_lookahead,
00072                         k_preamp,
00073                         k_postamp,
00074                         k_mode,                         
00075                         k_mode_linear,
00076                         k_mode_exponential,
00077                         
00078                         MAX_SAMPLES     = 256                                                   // Size of the lookahead buffers
00079                 };
00080                 
00081 
00082                 // OBJECT LIFE                                  
00083                 tt_limiter()                                                                    // Constructor          
00084                 {
00085                         buf1 = buf2 = gain = 0;
00086                 
00087                         // allocate lookahead buffers
00088                         buf1 = (float *)mem_alloc(MAX_SAMPLES * sizeof(float));
00089                         buf2 = (float *)mem_alloc(MAX_SAMPLES * sizeof(float));
00090                         gain = (float *)mem_alloc(MAX_SAMPLES * sizeof(float));
00091 
00092 //                      buffer1 = new tt_buffer;
00093 //                      buffer2 = new tt_buffer;
00094 //                      buffer_gain = new tt_buffer;
00095 //                      buffer1->set_attr(tt_buffer::k_length_samples, MAX_SAMPLES);
00096 //                      buffer2->set_attr(tt_buffer::k_length_samples, MAX_SAMPLES);
00097 //                      buffer_gain->set_attr(tt_buffer::k_length_samples, MAX_SAMPLES);
00098 
00099                         // set defaults
00100                         set_attr(k_threshold, 0.0);
00101                     set_attr(k_lookahead, 100);
00102                     set_attr(k_mode, k_mode_exponential);
00103                     set_attr(k_preamp, 0.0);
00104                     set_attr(k_postamp, 0.0);
00105                     set_attr(k_release, 1000.0);
00106                     set_attr(k_defeat_dcblocker, 0);
00107                     clear();
00108                 }
00109 
00110                 ~tt_limiter()                                                                   // Destructor
00111                 {
00112 //                      delete buffer1;
00113 //                      delete buffer2;
00114 //                      delete buffer_gain;
00115                         mem_free(buf1);
00116                         mem_free(buf2);
00117                         mem_free(gain);
00118                 }
00119 
00120 
00121                 // ATTRIBUTES
00122                 void set_attr(tt_selector sel, tt_attribute_value val)  // Set Attributes
00123                 {
00124                         switch (sel){
00125 
00126                                 case k_threshold:
00127                                         threshold = decibels_to_amplitude(val);
00128                                         break;
00129                                 case k_release:
00130                                         release = val;
00131                                         set_recover();
00132                                         break;
00133                                 case k_lookahead:
00134                                         lookahead = clip(tt_attribute_value_discrete(val), (tt_attribute_value_discrete)1, tt_attribute_value_discrete(MAX_SAMPLES - 1));
00135                                     recip = 1.0 / (double)lookahead;
00136                                         break;
00137                                 case k_preamp:
00138                                         preamp = decibels_to_amplitude(val);
00139                                         break;
00140                                 case k_postamp:
00141                                         postamp = decibels_to_amplitude(val);
00142                                         break;
00143                                 case k_mode:
00144                                         mode = (tt_attribute_value_discrete)val;
00145                                         set_recover();
00146                                         break;
00147                                 case k_defeat_dcblocker:
00148                                         defeat_dcblocker = val;
00149                                         if(defeat_dcblocker){
00150                                                 dsp_executor_mono = &tt_limiter::dsp_vector_calc_mono_nodcblock;
00151                                                 dsp_executor_stereo = &tt_limiter::dsp_vector_calc_stereo_nodcblock;
00152                                         }
00153                                         else{
00154                                                 dsp_executor_mono = &tt_limiter::dsp_vector_calc_mono;
00155                                                 dsp_executor_stereo = &tt_limiter::dsp_vector_calc_stereo;
00156                                         }
00157                                         break;
00158                         }
00159                 }
00160 
00161                 tt_attribute_value get_attr(tt_selector sel)                            // Get Attributes
00162                 {
00163                         switch (sel){
00164                                 case k_threshold:
00165                                         return amplitude_to_decibels(threshold);
00166                                 case k_release:
00167                                         return release;
00168                                 case k_lookahead:
00169                                         return lookahead;
00170                                 case k_preamp:
00171                                         return amplitude_to_decibels(preamp);
00172                                 case k_postamp:
00173                                         return amplitude_to_decibels(postamp);
00174                                 case k_mode:
00175                                         return mode;
00176                                 case k_defeat_dcblocker:
00177                                         return defeat_dcblocker;
00178                                 default:
00179                                         return 0.0;
00180                         }
00181                 }
00182                                 
00183                 
00184                 // clear
00185                 void clear(void)
00186                 {
00187                         short i;
00188                         for (i=0; i<MAX_SAMPLES; i++){
00189                         buf1[i]=0.; 
00190                         buf2[i]=0.; 
00191                         gain[i]=1.;
00192                     }
00193 
00194                         bp = 0;
00195                         last = 1.;
00196                         set_recover();
00197 
00198                         last_input1 = 0.0;
00199                         last_output1 = 0.0;     
00200                         last_input2 = 0.0;
00201                         last_output2 = 0.0;     
00202                 }
00203 
00204                 
00205                 /*****************************************************
00206                  * DSP LOOPS
00207                  *****************************************************/
00208                 
00209                 // Publically exposed interface for MONO dsp routine
00210                 void dsp_vector_calc(tt_audio_signal *in, tt_audio_signal *out)
00211                 {
00212                         (*this.*dsp_executor_mono)(in, out);    // Run the function pointed to by our function pointer
00213                 }
00214         
00215                 // Publically exposed interface for STEREO dsp routine
00216                 void dsp_vector_calc(tt_audio_signal *in1, tt_audio_signal *in2, tt_audio_signal *out1, tt_audio_signal *out2)
00217                 {
00218                         (*this.*dsp_executor_stereo)(in1, in2, out1, out2);     // Run the function pointed to by our function pointer
00219                 }
00220         
00221         
00222         private:
00223                 
00224                 // DSP LOOP - STEREO
00225                 void dsp_vector_calc_stereo(tt_audio_signal *in1, tt_audio_signal *in2, tt_audio_signal *out1, tt_audio_signal *out2)
00226                 {
00227                         double left_sample, right_sample, curgain, newgain, inc;
00228                         double acc, maybe;
00229                         long ind, flag, bbp, i;
00230                         char lin = (mode == k_mode_linear);                     // done at the vector to save a few cycles
00231                         temp_vs = in1->vectorsize;              
00232                                         
00233                     while(temp_vs--){
00234                         right_sample = *in1->vector++ * preamp;
00235                         left_sample = *in2->vector++ * preamp;
00236 
00237                                 // Integrated DC Blocker:
00238                                 last_output1 = anti_denormal(left_sample - last_input1 + (last_output1 * 0.9997));
00239                                 last_input1 = anti_denormal(left_sample);
00240                                 last_output2 = anti_denormal(right_sample - last_input2 + (last_output2 * 0.9997));
00241                                 last_input2 = anti_denormal(right_sample);
00242                                 left_sample = last_output1;
00243                                 right_sample = last_output2;
00244 
00245                                 // Limiter...                   
00246                         buf1[bp] = right_sample * postamp;
00247                         buf2[bp] = left_sample * postamp;
00248                         
00249                         right_sample = fabs(right_sample);
00250                         left_sample = fabs(left_sample);
00251                         left_sample = ((right_sample > left_sample) ? right_sample : left_sample);
00252 
00253                         if (lin) 
00254                                 right_sample = last + recover;
00255                         else 
00256                                 right_sample = last + recover * ((last > 0.01) ? last : 1.);
00257                         
00258                         maybe = ((right_sample > threshold) ? threshold : right_sample);
00259                         gain[bp] = maybe;
00260                         
00261                         if (left_sample * maybe > threshold){
00262                                 curgain = threshold / left_sample;
00263                                 inc = (threshold - curgain);
00264                                 acc = 0;
00265                                 flag = 0;
00266                                 for (i=0; flag == 0 && i < lookahead; i++){
00267                                         ind = bp - i;
00268                                         if (ind < 0) 
00269                                                 ind += MAX_SAMPLES;
00270                                         if (lin) 
00271                                                 newgain = curgain + inc * acc;
00272                                         else newgain = curgain + inc * (acc * acc);
00273                                         if (newgain < gain[ind]) 
00274                                                 gain[ind] = newgain;
00275                                         else flag = 1;
00276                                         acc = acc + recip;
00277                                 }
00278                         }
00279                         bbp = bp - lookahead;
00280                         if (bbp < 0) 
00281                                 bbp += MAX_SAMPLES;
00282                                 
00283                         *out1->vector++ = buf1[bbp] * gain[bbp];
00284                         *out2->vector++ = buf2[bbp] * gain[bbp];
00285                         
00286                         last = gain[bp];
00287                         
00288                         bp++; 
00289                         if (bp >= MAX_SAMPLES) 
00290                                 bp = 0;
00291                     }
00292                     in1->reset(); in2->reset(); out1->reset(); out2->reset();
00293                 }
00294 
00295                 // DSP LOOP - MONO
00296                 // NOTE: This is no more efficient than the stereo version - need to optimize sometime
00297                 void dsp_vector_calc_mono(tt_audio_signal *in, tt_audio_signal *out)
00298                 {
00299                         double left_sample, right_sample, curgain, newgain, inc;
00300                         double acc, maybe;
00301                         long ind, flag, bbp, i;
00302                         char lin = (mode == k_mode_linear);                     // done at the vector to save a few cycles
00303                         temp_vs = in->vectorsize;               
00304                                                 
00305                     while (temp_vs--){
00306                         left_sample = right_sample = *in->vector++ * preamp;
00307 
00308                                 // Integrated DC Blocker:
00309                                 last_output1 = anti_denormal(left_sample - last_input1 + (last_output1 * 0.9997));
00310                                 last_input1 = anti_denormal(left_sample);
00311                                 left_sample = last_output1;
00312 
00313                         // Limiter...
00314                         buf1[bp] = right_sample * postamp;
00315                         buf2[bp] = left_sample * postamp;
00316                         
00317                         right_sample = fabs(right_sample);
00318                         left_sample = fabs(left_sample);
00319                         left_sample = ((right_sample > left_sample) ? right_sample : left_sample);
00320 
00321                         if (lin) 
00322                                 right_sample = last + recover;
00323                         else 
00324                                 right_sample = last + recover * ((last > 0.01) ? last : 1.);
00325                         
00326                         maybe = ((right_sample > threshold) ? threshold : right_sample);
00327                         gain[bp] = maybe;
00328                         
00329                         if (left_sample * maybe > threshold){
00330                                 curgain = threshold / left_sample;
00331                                 inc = (threshold - curgain);
00332                                 acc = 0;
00333                                 flag = 0;
00334                                 for (i=0; flag == 0 && i < lookahead; i++){
00335                                         ind = bp - i;
00336                                         if (ind < 0) 
00337                                                 ind += MAX_SAMPLES;
00338                                         if (lin) 
00339                                                 newgain = curgain + inc * acc;
00340                                         else newgain = curgain + inc * (acc * acc);
00341                                         if (newgain < gain[ind]) 
00342                                                 gain[ind] = newgain;
00343                                         else flag = 1;
00344                                         acc = acc + recip;
00345                                 }
00346                         }
00347                         bbp = bp - lookahead;
00348                         if (bbp < 0) 
00349                                 bbp += MAX_SAMPLES;
00350                                 
00351                         *out->vector++ = buf1[bbp] * gain[bbp];
00352                         
00353                         last = gain[bp];
00354                         
00355                         bp++; 
00356                         if (bp >= MAX_SAMPLES) 
00357                                 bp = 0;
00358                     }
00359                     in->reset(); out->reset();
00360                 }

00374                         left_sample = *in2->vector++ * preamp;
00375

00380                         left_sample = fabs(left_sample);

00382 
00383                         if (lin) 
00384                                 right_sample = last + recover;
00385                         else

00392                                 curgain = threshold / left_sample;
00393                                 inc = (threshold - curgain);
00394                                 acc = 0;
00395                                 flag = 0;
00396                                 for (i=0; flag == 0 && i < lookahead; i++){
00397                                         ind = bp - i;
00398                                         if (ind < 0) 
00399                                                 ind += MAX_SAMPLES;
00400                                         if (lin) 
00401                                                 newgain = curgain + inc * acc;
00402                                         else newgain = curgain + inc * (acc * acc);

00404                                                 gain[ind] = newgain;
00405                                         else flag = 1;
00406                                         acc = acc + recip;
00407                                 }

00410                         if (bbp < 0) 
00411                                 bbp += MAX_SAMPLES;
00412

00414                         *out2->vector++ = buf2[bbp] * gain[bbp];
00415

00421                     }

00423                 }

00425                 // DSP LOOP - MONO
00426                 // NOTE: This is no more efficient than the stereo version - need to optimize sometime
00427                 void dsp_vector_calc_mono_nodcblock(tt_audio_signal *in, tt_audio_signal *out)
00428                 {
00429                         double left_sample, right_sample, curgain, newgain, inc;
00430                         double acc, maybe;
00431                         long ind, flag, bbp, i;
00432                         char lin = (mode == k_mode_linear);                     // done at the vector to save a few cycles
00433                         temp_vs = in->vectorsize;               
00434                                                 
00435                     while (temp_vs--){
00436                         left_sample = right_sample = *in->vector++ * preamp;
00437                         
00438                         buf1[bp] = right_sample * postamp;
00439                         buf2[bp] = left_sample * postamp;
00440                         
00441                         right_sample = fabs(right_sample);
00442                         left_sample = fabs(left_sample);
00443                         left_sample = ((right_sample > left_sample) ? right_sample : left_sample);
00444 
00445                         if (lin) 
00446                                 right_sample = last + recover;
00447                         else 
00448                                 right_sample = last + recover * ((last > 0.01) ? last : 1.);
00449                         
00450                         maybe = ((right_sample > threshold) ? threshold : right_sample);
00451                         gain[bp] = maybe;
00452                         
00453                         if (left_sample * maybe > threshold){
00454                                 curgain = threshold / left_sample;
00455                                 inc = (threshold - curgain);
00456                                 acc = 0;
00457                                 flag = 0;
00458                                 for (i=0; flag == 0 && i < lookahead; i++){
00459                                         ind = bp - i;
00460                                         if (ind < 0) 
00461                                                 ind += MAX_SAMPLES;
00462                                         if (lin) 
00463                                                 newgain = curgain + inc * acc;
00464                                         else newgain = curgain + inc * (acc * acc);
00465                                         if (newgain < gain[ind]) 
00466                                                 gain[ind] = newgain;
00467                                         else flag = 1;
00468                                         acc = acc + recip;
00469                                 }
00470                         }

00472                         if (bbp < 0) 
00473                                 bbp += MAX_SAMPLES;
00474

00476
